contentList.content: Call forth the cold mountain winds and reduce the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1]. Your next melee attacks deal an additional [2].
Affected entity's fists are glistening with frost. Its melee attacks deal an additional [1].
The target cannot use reactions. This spell has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on creatures with metal armour. Your next melee attacks deal an additional [1].
Affected entity's fists are sparking with lightning. Its melee attacks deal an additional [1].
